_comment: This data is an early work-in-progress and contains errors. Produced by @michaelh at Discuss and Discover SuttaCentral forum - please get in touch! Finished code forthcoming.

How a female is well-organized at work [: Skilled and tireless in doing domestic duties for her husband
How a female manages the domestic help (: Knows what work her husband’s domestic bondservants, employees, and workers have completed, and what they’ve left incomplete
Knows who is sick, and who is fit or unwell
Distributes to each a fair portion of various foods
How a female acts lovingly toward her hu: Would not transgress in any way that her husband would not consider loveable, even for the sake of her own life
How a female preserves his earnings (a c: Tries to guard and protect any income her husband earns
How a female is accomplished in faith [a: Has faith in the Realized One’s awakening
How a female is accomplished in ethics (: Doesn’t kill living creatures, steal, commit sexual misconduct, lie, or consume alcoholic drinks that cause negligence
How a female is accomplished in generosi: Lives at home rid of the stain of stinginess
Freely generous, open-handed, loving to let go, committed to charity, loving to give and to share
How a female is accomplished in wisdom (: Has the wisdom of arising and passing away which is noble, penetrative, and leads to the complete ending of suffering
